üöÄ Quick Start Guide

Note: These dashboards automatically fetch and display metrics from your GitHub repository using the GitHub Actions workflow.

  1. Access the Dashboards: Click on either dashboard card above to start exploring your PR metrics.
  2. Automatic Updates: Data is automatically refreshed by the pr-metrics.yml workflow that runs on a schedule.
  3. Manual Refresh: To manually update metrics, trigger the workflow:
    • Go to Actions tab in your repository
    • Select "PR Metrics Collection" workflow
    • Click "Run workflow"
  4. Customize Your View: Use the filters and date range selectors (Advanced Dashboard) to focus on specific time periods or PR types.
  5. Share Insights: Share the dashboard URL with your team to provide visibility into PR performance and collaboration metrics.

üí° Pro Tip: For the best experience, enable GitHub Pages for this repository under Settings ‚Üí Pages, and select the main branch with /.github/dashboards as the source directory.
